trans-unit.source: Please type the correct password directly into the text box below and click the button below.
The Password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

source.g: You have been tasked with distributing a newsletter that will be pushed out to administrators by email. Which of the following is the best solution?
Create a messaging queue in Amazon CloudFront.
Create a messaging queue in Amazon CloudFront.
Store the newsletters in an Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket and distribute them with AWS CloudTrail.
Route the newsletters to an Amazon ElastiCache store.
Create a topic in Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) to which administrators can subscribe.
You have been tasked with distributing a newsletter that will be pushed out to administrators by email. Which of the following is the best solution?
pushed out to administrators by email

Amazon CloudFront delivers data, videos, applications, and APIs through edge locations, not email.

to eliminate the first distractor, then click

You have been tasked with distributing a newsletter that will be pushed out to administrators by email. Which of the following is the best solution?
Create a messaging queue in Amazon CloudFront.
Create a messaging queue in Amazon CloudFront.
Store the newsletters in an Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket and distribute them with AWS CloudTrail.
Route the newsletters to an Amazon ElastiCache store.
Create a topic in Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) to which administrators can subscribe.
Creating a topic in Amazon SNS that administrators can subscribe to is the best solution for distributing a newsletter by email.
